summary: This is a brief internal jail communication dated August 10, 2019, regarding the status of suicide watch and psychological observation for inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #85428-054). It notes that Epstein is on 'Psych Observation' and pending placement in a Special Housing Unit (SHU) bedspace.

persons.name: Williams

events.title: Jail Status Update
events.description: Internal jail communication updates the status of inmates regarding suicide watch and psychological observation, noting Jeffrey Epstein is on psychological observation and pending SHU placement.

keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in jail.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified by inmate number #85428-054 and is listed as being on 'Psych Observation'.
Epstein is noted as 'Pending SHU Bedspace', indicating he was awaiting placement in a Special Housing Unit.
The document is a brief administrative update on inmate statuses, showing the jail's internal tracking system.
